name: sd-checkout-code
command: echo Cloning github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide, on branch branchName && export SCM_URL=github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide && if [ ! -z $SCM_USERNAME ] && [ ! -z $SCM_ACCESS_TOKEN ]; then SCM_URL="$SCM_USERNAME:$SCM_ACCESS_TOKEN@$SCM_URL"; fi && git clone --quiet --progress --branch branchName https://$SCM_URL $SD_SOURCE_DIR && git reset --hard 12345 && echo Reset to 12345 && echo Setting user name and user email && git config user.name sd-buildbot && git config user.email dev-null@screwdriver.cd
